# Welcome {.unnumbered}

<!--# This file is an intro to the *website.* intro.qmd is an intro to the *book.* -->

This is the website for the work-in-progress book, ***Web APIs with R.*** This book will teach you how to create and utilize web APIs in R.

::: callout-warning
This book is very much a work in progress.

I am currently focused on 
sorting out the scope of the book, and the general structure.
:::
